channel.title: Butte County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Butte County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-20 West at US-26
item.description: US-20 West at US-26 in Butte County. US-26 West joins US-20 West to Carey.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching US-26
item.description: US-20 West approaching US-26 in Butte County. Turn right for entrance to Idaho National Laboratory. Continue straight for Arco via US-20/US-26; left for US-26 East to Blackfoot.

item.title: ID-33 East at ID-22 East
item.description: ID-33 east at ID-22 east to Dubois and Salmon (via ID-28). Continue east on ID-33 for Rexburg.

item.title: ID-33 East Approaching ID-22
item.description: ID-33 east approaching ID-22. Turn left for ID-22 east.

item.title: ID-33 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-33 east. Distance to Dubois (via ID-22), Rexburg, and Butte (Montana - via ID-22 and I-15).

item.title: ID-33 East at Little Lost River Highway
item.description: ID-33 East at Little Lost River Highway in Howe. Turn right to continue east on ID-33 towards Dubois and Rexburg.

item.title: ID-33 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-33 east. Distance to Howe, Dubois (via ID-22), and Rexburg.

item.title: ID-33 East - Butte County
item.description: ID-33 east in Butte County. First route marker on ID-33 eastbound.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East at ID-33
item.description: US-20/US-26 East at ID-33 in Butte County.

item.title: US-26 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-26 east. Distance to Atomic City, Blackfoot, and Pocatello.

item.title: US-93 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-93 north. Distance to Moore, Mackay, and Salmon.

item.title: US-20 East - Idaho National Laboratory
item.description: US-20 east at junction to Idaho National Laboratory (INL).

item.title: US-20/US-26 East Split
item.description: US-20/US-26 east at US-20/US-26 split. US-26 continues east to Pocatello and Blackfoot, US-20 east goes to Idaho Falls.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East - EBR-1 Junction
item.description: US-20/US-26 East at junction to EBR-1 (Experimental Breeder Reactor - 1), which was the worlds first electricity generating nuclear power plant. EBR-1 is part of the Idaho National Laboratory (INL), and as scheduled tours for the general public. Also turn right for the RWMC (Radioactive Waste Management Complex) at the INL.

item.title: ID-33 East at ID-22 East
item.description: ID-33 east at ID-22 east to Dubois and Salmon. Continue east on ID-33 for Rexburg.

item.title: ID-33 East Approaching ID-22
item.description: ID-33 east approaching ID-22. Turn left for ID-22 east.

item.title: US-20/US-93/US-26 West - Peaks to Craters
item.description: Peaks to Craters Scenic Byway on US-20/US-26 West/US-93 South between Arco and Craters of the Moon. Peaks to Craters Scenic Byway is one of the newest Idaho scenic byways, created in 2010. It runs from Challis to just south of Sun Valley.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West at US-93
item.description: US-20/US-26 west at US-93. Use US-93 north for Mackay. Use US-20/US-26 west/US-93 south for Twin Falls and Boise.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West at US-93
item.description: US-20/US-26 west approaching US-93

item.title: Leaving Idaho National Laboratory - US-20/US-26 West
item.description: US-20/US-26 West - Leaving Idaho National Laboratory in Butte County.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West Approaching ID-33
item.description: US-20/US-26 west approaching ID-33 junction in Butte County.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East Split
item.description: US-20/US-26 east at US-20/US-26 split. US-26 continues east to Pocatello and Blackfoot, US-20 east goes to Idaho Falls.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East Split
item.description: US-20/US-26 east approaching US-20/US-26 split. US-20 has been multiplexed with US-26 since Carey, Idaho.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East Split
item.description: US-20/US-26 east approaching US-20/US-26 split.

item.title: End ID-22 at ID-33
item.description: ID-33 to Rexburg and Arco at End ID-22. Big Southern Butte in background.

item.title: End ID-22 at ID-33
item.description: End ID-22 at ID-33

item.title: End ID-33 at US-20/US-26
item.description: Jct. US-20/US-26 on ID-33 West

item.title: US-20/US-26 East/US-93 North Split
